content:
Made this post just to say that ajikan is such an amazing band, all their albums are amazing, from all their albums i gotta say that it is between feedback file or magic disk, gosh their music is so fitting for my ears.
I hope I can possible go to one of their concerts and listen to them live.
well, thats all
bye.
title: i love ajikan

content:
Its been a while, hasnt it?
Recently, I have been feeling an immense wave of boredom, a hungering boredom that has consumed me.
Ill try to actually do something with this blog.
bye.
title: boredom

content:
Hello, this is my first(almost) blog post!
After many attemepts of trying to set one up well, this one finally worked. I dont intend on sharing this blog, but if you happened to stumble on this blog expect lots of reviews, rambles and art.
title: Hello World
